explains: n. 联络，沟通；联络人；私通，婚外情；加浓调料，蛋黄勾芡；（法语和其他语言中的）连音，连诵

sentences.en: He is acting as liaison with the film crew.
sentences.cn: 他担任拍摄组的联络员。

sentences.en: She acts as a liaison between patients and staff.
sentences.cn: 她担当病人和医务人员之间的联络员。

sentences.en: She gave him a factual account of the chronology of her brief liaison.
sentences.cn: 她就自己在短时间内的联络给了我一个确凿的大事记。
